author: Roger Staubach

title: Life is an unfoldment, and the further we travel the more truth we can comprehend. To understand the things that are at our door is the best preparation for understanding those that lie beyond.
author: Hypatia

title: Sincere and generous collaboration is the best way to fulfil the legitimate aspirations of each person and achieve great collective goals for the common good and the general interest.
author: Felipe VI of Spain

title: Today, actors aren't forced to ditch their regional accents like they used to. The best example's Tom Baker, a Scouser who went to great lengths to change his accent and ended up with something alien - and fantastic. It's sad that when the likes of him go, there won't be those sorts of accents any more.
author: Matt Berry

title: I know what's best for me, and I want to do things my way. So, now I listen to my inner voice and my heart - and that's how I make my decisions.
author: Nina Hagen

title: Battle is the most magnificent competition in which a human being can indulge. It brings out all that is best; it removes all that is base. All men are afraid in battle. The coward is the one who lets his fear overcome his sense of duty. Duty is the essence of manhood.
author: George S. Patton

title: Just do your best. I find that if I set that goal for myself and no one else, I feel good.
author: Cobie Smulders

title: And it is still true, no matter how old you are, when you go out into the world it is best to hold hands and stick together.
author: Robert Fulghum

title: Surround yourself with good people. People who are going to be honest with you and look out for your best interests.
author: Derek Jeter

title: Motherhood is at its best when the tender chords of sympathy have been touched.
author: Paul P. Harris

title: Education must provide the opportunities for self-fulfillment; it can at best provide a rich and challenging environment for the individual to explore, in his own way.
author: Noam Chomsky

title: The one thing you've gotta do is that you need to always do the best you can do, no matter what the given situation, no matter what comes up against you. You do the best you can do, and you never give up. Never quit.
author: James Corden

title: Never say never. The things that you don't plan are the best. I'm a very spontaneous person.
author: Lindsay Lohan

title: I used to have all these plans and think 'Ah, I have my whole life figured out', but then I realized no matter how much I plan: life happens! So I find myself living day to day trying to do my best, embracing every moment as a learning opportunity and chance to get to know myself a little more.
author: Q'orianka Kilcher

title: I'm going to do what is best for the caucus.
author: Dick Durbin

title: The best thing I ever did in my life was to ask, 'Do I like everybody?' And the answer was, 'No.' So why should everybody like me? If people are against me, so what? I'm against them too.
author: Marjane Satrapi

title: No matter how good you are at planning, the pressure never goes away. So I don't fight it. I feed off it. I turn pressure into motivation to do my best.
author: Ben Carson

title: The waste basket is the writer's best friend.
author: Isaac Bashevis Singer

title: I do not need a trophy to tell myself that I am the best.
author: Zlatan Ibrahimovic

title: I've always said that your attitude is your best friend and your worst enemy.
author: Herm Edwards

title: My philosophy is that not only are you responsible for your life, but doing the best at this moment puts you I the best place for the next moment.
author: Oprah Winfrey

title: You've got keep your head up, keep fighting, and do the best you can.
author: Pablo Sandoval

title: I've really enjoyed playing this game. It's a game that I try my best to enjoy to the fullest. Without pressure. Relaxed. And that helps me when I play.
author: Asdrubal Cabrera

title: You need to think outside the box. You need to think differently if you want to sustain what, for me, is my peak performance: the very best that I can achieve as an athlete every day.
author: Tom Brady

title: A bad review is like baking a cake with all the best ingredients and having someone sit on it.
author: Danielle Steel

title: Traffic in the streets of Bombay is chaotic at best. Riding a bicycle is a dangerous occupation. However, there are hundreds of them on the streets competing with the cars and buses and lorries because it is the poor man's mode of transport.
author: Rohinton Mistry

title: I agree that my single-minded approach was a failing in life, but if I upset people, it was never intentional - it was just the unfortunate result of a burning desire to get the best out of myself and achieve as much as possible.
author: Geoffrey Boycott

title: Teamwork is the best kind of work, really.
author: Sigrid

title: God blessed me with great talent and good genetics. Plus, he blessed me with a good work ethic and a drive to want to be the best.
author: Benjamin Watson
